attributes.action: stop his plans on the three year pay deal for nurses etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a student nurse and i see more and more worrying issues to do with the governemnts plans for healthcare workers we have the bursary etc, now Mr Brown wants to offer a 3 yr pay deal instead of the ordinary 12 months. we will loose money not gain it.
